content.html:
Animation can exist within all components of an app and at all scales, from detailed icons to key transitions and actions. All elements work together to construct a seamless experience and a beautiful, functional app.

The most basic use of animation is in transitions, but an app can truly delight a user when animation is used in ways beyond the obvious. A menu icon that becomes an arrow or playback controls that smoothly change from one to the other serve dual functions: to inform the user and to imbue the app with a moment of wonder and a sense of superb craftsmanship.

figures.caption: Both icons and sheets of material can transition in concert with one another.
Icons can smoothly change from one image to another to serve dual functions at different times.
